track.name: C'mon Girl
comments: Flea and that bass...
One of the many reasons to like RHCP.
I love it! One of best song from SA.
bass line and drum line... ah :D
Flea is my new bass hero. :)
Love this song so, so much. The bass in it is godly!
Flea! Flea! ..he is all over the place.....  awesomeness!!!!
dang flea really got down on this track.
great Flea work thruout the whole song!

actually the best song i've ever heard.. it touches me!
especially the guitar solo - fantastic, powerful and calming at the same time - not comparable to anything else.
Awesome!!!
Love it
Flea is doin his thing on this one..
This song is all about Flea... :D
my heart is bleeding at 2:20

Sick bassline.
I really like this
